Rainy_Day_0: I hope the buffalos aren't in the rain.$s
Rainy_Day_1: Thank Yoba I have auto feeders in the buffalo barn, I don't want my dad getting soaked to feed them.
Rainy_Day_2: I wish you'd spent all day in bed with me.$4
Rainy_Day_3: Honey, I cleaned the house yesterday, so make sure not to bring in dirt from outside when you enter.$1
Rainy_Day_4: I was going to water some crops for you, but I guess it will have to be some other day.
Rainy_Night_0: Honey, come rest.$h#$e#Working in the rain can be so tiring.
Rainy_Night_1: Don't worry, I don't care if you like being the little spoon.$1
Rainy_Night_2: I wish I knew how to make pumpkin soup, dad always made it on rainy days.$1
Rainy_Night_3: Honey, if you get sick I can take care of the farm for you...and I can also take care of you.$1
Rainy_Night_4: Finally my husband is back! I hope you don't catch a cold!^Finally my wife is back! I hope you don't catch a cold!
Indoor_Day_0: I'm sorry honey, I can't really cook many things besides salads! But I've made this for you![240 606]$1
Indoor_Day_1: Have you ever reached the bottom of the abandoned mines?$1
Indoor_Day_2: Honey, if you pass by the boarding house, send my dad a kiss.$1#$e#And get me some coffee.$1
Indoor_Day_3: It feels really nice living with you, I don't mind doing the house chores while you do the farm ones.$1
Indoor_Day_4: I told my therapist we got married. She was very excited!$1
Indoor_Night_0: I read a very lovely romance today.$1#$e#It was about a girl who lived in the countryside and moved to the city.$1
Indoor_Night_1: Honey, have you been visiting Linus? I really like him.
Indoor_Night_2: Thank you for being this amazing person... now I really feel like part of the community.$1
Indoor_Night_3: A light dinner for you, honey. So you can sleep tight.[610 609 196]$4
Indoor_Night_4: Honey, while you were working on the farm, I cleaned the house and did the laundry.
Outdoor_0: The animals are very well treated. I checked them up...they are all healthy.$1
Outdoor_1: The animals must feel very happy walking in these huge fields.$1
Outdoor_2: I never thought I'd be living on a huge farm like this one.
Outdoor_3: I woke up early and checked my animals and store.$1#$b#And I also visited my dad.$1
Outdoor_4: You look so sexy working on the farm.$4
OneKid_1: I hope %kid1 grows up to be a farmer like you.
OneKid_2: I'm glad you sleep like a rock. kid1% woke me up at 4AM.$s
OneKid_3: Grandpa Joel is now a proper grandpa!$1
TwoKids_2: I hope our kids are nice to animals.
Good_1: You know, I always had a feeling we'd be together some day.$l
Good_4: I wonder if I can retire from the store someday. Probably gonna pass it on to one of our kids.$l
Good_9: I have been reading a lot lately, I used not to have time for that because of the store.$h
Neutral_0: I hope you'll still like me when I'm old or if I get fat.$s
Neutral_2: Last night you snored like a truck.#$e#Guess you were very tired from all the farm work.$1
Taking a break? Don't forget to feed the animals.
Neutral_3: Well, if Lewis had given me the license, I wouldn't have much time to spend with you.
Bad_9: Thank Yoba I didn't sell my place.$s
funLeave_Sheila: I'm heading to the store today. See you later honey.
funReturn_Sheila: Business's been slow lately since I married my best customer.$1#$e#Either way, I couldn't be happier.$4
spring_1: Honey, what're your plans for this year?$1
spring_12: I used to hide some eggs all around Marnie's ranch so she wouldn't find them and her ranch would smell.#$e#I have no regrets.
spring_23: Dancing with you tomorrow will be so romantic!$1
summer_1: Honey, make sure the animals are drinking a lot of water this summer. The same goes for you!
summer_10: I will be checking on dad tomorrow morning to walk him to the luau.$h
summer_27: It's going to be so romantic tomorrow.$4
fall_15: We are so winning tomorrow's fair.$1
fall_26: Don't get lost in the maze tomorrow.$1

winter_28: Here honey, let's celebrate this great year![459 348] $1
